languages.text: "Кей-морагх!.." {n}Взгляд Ирлиэт, направленный на старика, пылает негодованием, а рука тянется к клинку за поясом... Но эльдарка замирает — на секунду — с озадаченным выражением лица, которое быстро сменяется безразличием.{/n} "Для вас, мон-кай, предать кого-то так же естественно, как дышать. Но это... не мое дело. Продолжайте гнить в своем бесчестии — без меня".

traits.locale_text: [draft] {n}Эльдарка поджимает тонкие губы.{/n} "Вы, мон-кай, так предсказуемы".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Kae-morag!" {n}There is burning indignation in the look Yrliet gives the old man, her hand reaching for the blade hanging from her belt... But then, she goes still for a moment, puzzlement etched onto her face, before regaining its usual air of indifference.{/n} "Betrayal comes as naturally to you mon-keigh as breathing. But... it does not concern me. Continue rotting away in your dishonourable existence — I will have no part in it."
languages.original_text: "Кей-морагх!.." {n}Взгляд Ирлиэт, направленный на старика, пылает негодованием, а рука тянется к клинку за поясом... Но эльдарка замирает — на секунду — с озадаченным выражением лица, которое быстро сменяется безразличием.{/n} "Для вас, мон-кай, предать кого-то так же естественно, как дышать. Но это... не мое дело. Продолжайте гнить в своем бесчестии — без меня".

languages.text: "Kae-morag!" {n}Yrliets Blick, der auf dem alten Mann ruht, glüht vor Empörung, und ihre Hand greift nach der Klinge an ihrem Gürtel ... Doch dann hält sie kurz inne, die Miene verwirrt, doch schon kurz darauf regiert wieder ihre gewohnte Gleichgültigkeit.{/n} "Verrat ist für Euch Chem-Pan-Sey so natürlich wie Atmen. Aber ... das kümmert mich nicht. Verrottet weiter in Eurer ehrlosen Existenz – ich habe damit nichts zu tun."
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag!" {n}There is burning indignation in the look Yrliet gives the old man, her hand reaching for the blade hanging from her belt... But then, she goes still for a moment, puzzlement etched onto her face, before regaining its usual air of indifference.{/n} "Betrayal comes as naturally to you mon-keigh as breathing. Doch dann hält sie kurz inne, die Miene verwirrt, doch schon kurz darauf regiert wieder ihre gewohnte Gleichgültigkeit.{/n} "Verrat ist für Euch Chem-Pan-Sey so natürlich wie Atmen. Aber ... das kümmert mich nicht. Verrottet weiter in Eurer ehrlosen Existenz – ich habe damit nichts zu tun."

languages.text: « Kae-morag ! » {n}Yrliet observe le vieil homme, les yeux flamboyants d'indignation, et pose sa main sur l'arme qu'elle porte à la ceinture... Mais elle s'immobilise un instant tandis qu'un voile de perplexité tombe sur son visage. Elle reprend cependant rapidement contenance et affiche de nouveau son impassibilité familière.{/n} « Les mon-keigh trahissent comme ils respirent. Mais... cela ne me concerne pas. Continuez de vous complaire dans votre existence indigne... moi, je refuse d'en faire partie. »
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag!" {n}There is burning indignation in the look Yrliet gives the old man, her hand reaching for the blade hanging from her belt... But then, she goes still for a moment, puzzlement etched onto her face, before regaining its usual air of indifference.{/n} "Betrayal comes as naturally to you mon-keigh as breathing. But... it does not concern me. Continue rotting away in your dishonourable existence — I will have no part in it."

Mais elle s'immobilise un instant tandis qu'un voile de perplexité tombe sur son visage. Elle reprend cependant rapidement contenance et affiche de nouveau son impassibilité familière.{/n} « Les mon-keigh trahissent comme ils respirent. Mais... cela ne me concerne pas. Continuez de vous complaire dans votre existence indigne... moi, je refuse d'en faire partie. »

languages.text: “该死！”{n}伊莉耶特怒不可遏地瞪着老人，伸手去摸腰带上的战刀……但随后，她沉默片刻，脸上露出了困惑的表情，之后再次恢复了往常的冷漠。{/n}“对你们猴子而言，背叛就像呼吸一样自然。不过……这些事情与我无关。继续在你可鄙的生活中慢慢腐烂吧，我无意参与其中。”
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag!" {n}There is burning indignation in the look Yrliet gives the old man, her hand reaching for the blade hanging from her belt... But then, she goes still for a moment, puzzlement etched onto her face, before regaining its usual air of indifference.{/n} "Betrayal comes as naturally to you mon-keigh as breathing. But... it does not concern me. Continue rotting away in your dishonourable existence — I will have no part in it."

traits.locale_text: “该死！”{n}伊莉耶特怒不可遏地瞪着老人，伸手去摸腰带上的战刀……但随后，她沉默片刻，脸上露出了困惑的表情，之后再次恢复了往常的冷漠。{/n}“对你们猴子而言，背叛就像呼吸一样自然。不过……这些事情与我无关。继续在你可鄙的生活中慢慢腐烂吧，我无意参与其中。”

languages.text: «¡Kae-morag!». {n}La mirada que Yrliet dedica al anciano está cargada de una indignación llameante, y su mano busca el arma de su cinto... pero, después, se detiene por un momento con una expresión perpleja antes de recuperar sus aires de indiferencia habituales.{/n} «La traición es tan natural como el respirar para los mon-keigh, pero... eso no me concierne. Sigue pudriéndote en tu existencia deshonrosa; yo no tomaré partido en esto».
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag!" {n}There is burning indignation in the look Yrliet gives the old man, her hand reaching for the blade hanging from her belt... But then, she goes still for a moment, puzzlement etched onto her face, before regaining its usual air of indifference.{/n} "Betrayal comes as naturally to you mon-keigh as breathing. But... it does not concern me. Continue rotting away in your dishonourable existence — I will have no part in it."

traits.locale_text: «¡Kae-morag!». {n}La mirada que Yrliet dedica al anciano está cargada de una indignación llameante, y su mano busca el arma de su cinto... pero, después, se detiene por un momento con una expresión perpleja antes de recuperar sus aires de indiferencia habituales.{/n} «La traición es tan natural como el respirar para los mon-keigh, pero... eso no me concierne. Sigue pudriéndote en tu existencia deshonrosa; yo no tomaré partido en esto».

languages.text: 「ケイ＝モラグ！」{n}ユリエットが老人の男を睨みつけるその目には燃えるような憤りが宿り、彼女は腰に下げた刃に手を伸ばした…しかし、しばらく静止し、困惑の色を浮かべた後、いつもの冷淡な表情を取り戻した。{/n}「裏切りは、モン＝ケイのお前にとって呼吸するように自然にできることだ。だが…それは私には関係ない。恥知らずな生を腐らせ続けろ、私はそんなものに関わりたくない」
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag!" {n}There is burning indignation in the look Yrliet gives the old man, her hand reaching for the blade hanging from her belt... But then, she goes still for a moment, puzzlement etched onto her face, before regaining its usual air of indifference.{/n} "Betrayal comes as naturally to you mon-keigh as breathing. But... it does not concern me. Continue rotting away in your dishonourable existence — I will have no part in it."

traits.locale_text: 「ケイ＝モラグ！」{n}ユリエットが老人の男を睨みつけるその目には燃えるような憤りが宿り、彼女は腰に下げた刃に手を伸ばした…しかし、しばらく静止し、困惑の色を浮かべた後、いつもの冷淡な表情を取り戻した。{/n}「裏切りは、モン＝ケイのお前にとって呼吸するように自然にできることだ。だが…それは私には関係ない。恥知らずな生を腐らせ続けろ、私はそんなものに関わりたくない」

languages.text: "Kae-morag!" {n}Yrliet'in yaşlı adama attığı bakışta yanıp tutuşan bir öfke görüyorsun. Eli, kemerinden sarkan bıçağına uzanıyor... Sonra bir anlığına hareketsiz kalıyor, yüzünde şaşkınlık beliriyor. Ardından her zamanki kayıtsız ifadesine geri bürünüyor.{/n} "İhanet size, mon-keighlere nefes almak kadar doğal gelir. Ama... Bu beni ilgilendirmez. Onursuz varoluşunuzda çürümeye devam edin. Bu işte rol oynamayacağım."
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag!" {n}There is burning indignation in the look Yrliet gives the old man, her hand reaching for the blade hanging from her belt... But then, she goes still for a moment, puzzlement etched onto her face, before regaining its usual air of indifference.{/n} "Betrayal comes as naturally to you mon-keigh as breathing. But... it does not concern me. Continue rotting away in your dishonourable existence — I will have no part in it."

traits.locale_text: "Kae-morag!" {n}Yrliet'in yaşlı adama attığı bakışta yanıp tutuşan bir öfke var, eli kemerinden sarkan bıçağına uzanıyor... Fakat sonra bir anlığına hareketsiz kalıyor, yüzünde şaşkınlık beliriyor. Ardından her zamanki kayıtsız ifadesine geri bürünüyor.{/n} "İhanet size, mon-keighlere nefes almak kadar doğal gelir. Ama... Bu beni ilgilendirmiyor. Onursuz varoluşunuzda çürümeye devam edin. Ben bunda hiçbir rol oynamayacağım."
